text.title: part1_Billy West, voice of Ren and Stimpy, Futurama, on the rough start that shaped his life

head.s: The use of celebrities for voiceovers

p.hi:
David Shankbone
:
You ’re known for speaking about the use of
famous actors
to do
voice-over
.
What is your central problem with their use ?

text.p:
Billy
West
:
My problem is that if they were judged by the same standards we were , that we have to try and get work with , they would be pretty piss poor as
voice performers
.

BW :
The standards are that you have a really special voice that you can go around and do that voice and make a living that people just instantly love it .
Nobody is just instantly in love with the usual suspects .
Voices that we see in the cartoon movies now .

BW :
No , he 's different , he understands character .
I mean he understands characterization and voice changes .
And so does
Mike Myers
and so does
Eddie Murphy
.

hi.s:
DS :
Jerry Seinfeld
as well in
Bee Movie
?

text.p:
BW :
No , that ’s not it because he‘s doing a character that looks exactly like him and sounds exactly like him .
I mean ,
Will Smith
does characters that are drawn to look like him and sound like him .
I wish I had that luxury .
Nobody draws a character that looks like me and sounds like me for me to just step in and be the perfect person for the role .
You know what I mean ?

hi.s: Not to do characters around stars ?

p.s: The thing is , I do n’t have an issue with the fact that these movies are being made .
If I could audition for them and I did n’t get them , I still would n’t have an issue with them .

But this is the thing : they audition us for these movies and then they play it for the A-list people , for these celebrities , so they can strip my talents ’ abilities and kind of toss them over to the celebrity just to make it look better than it would be .
I do n’t like that stuff .

hi.s: They audition us for these movies and then they play it for the A-list people , for these celebrities , so they can strip my talents ’ abilities and kind of toss them over to the celebrity just to make it look better than it would be .

p.hi: — West on laying down cartoon characters in auditions , only to have a celebrity end up doing the voice with the quirks West 's voice introduced .

hi.s: DS : They ’ll have you come in , or someone of your caliber come in , and actually shape the voice around the character and then they ’ll present it to the celebrity as the template ?
